properties.areaDesc: Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI; Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 10:16PM EST until March 2 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 6
feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge and
Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Sunday to 2 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SUNDAY TO 2 AM EST MONDAY
